verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: fancies] [ARG1: himself the greatest dealmaker the world has ever seen] , but he lurches from one extreme to the other like a baby throwing a tantrum . After years of bashing the Chinese for the trade deficit , he has now instructed the Commerce Department to lift sanctions against ZTE , a maker of cell phones , that …
